member.name: P:FFXIMemory.MemoryScanner.RefreshRate
member.summary: The scanning rate interval. The default is 200 ms
member.remarks: Anything less than 10 causes ridiculous memory consumption and therefore is dropped and 10 is the minimum set vaule. 100ms is an ideal interval for smooth movement and low memory consumption
